verses.verse: הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah become עָלַי֮ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai and יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- The hand יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD וַיּוֹצִאֵ֤נִי <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-tzi-'E-ni was upon me and carried me out בְר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> ve-Ru-ach in the spirit יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD וַיְנִיחֵ֖נִי <S%H5117><s%> vay-ni-Che-ni and set me down בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst הַבִּקְעָ֑ה <S%H1237><s%> hab-bik-'Ah; of the valley וְהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hi and it was מְלֵאָ֥ה <S%H4392><s%> me-le-'Ah which [was] full עֲצָמֽוֹת׃ <S%H6106><s%> a-tza-Mot. of bones

וְהֶעֱבִירַ֥נִי <S%H5674><s%> ve-he-'e-vi-Ra-ni And caused me to pass עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem among סָבִ֣יב׀ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv by them round about סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv; about וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold רַבּ֤וֹת <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bot many מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od and behold [there were] very עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- among פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei in the open הַבִּקְעָ֔ה <S%H1237><s%> hab-bik-'Ah, valley וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and lo יְבֵשׁ֥וֹת <S%H3002><s%> ye-ve-Shot dry מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. and lo [they were] very

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man הֲתִחְיֶ֖ינָה <S%H2421><s%> ha-tich-Yei-nah live הָעֲצָמ֣וֹת <S%H6106><s%> ha-'a-tza-Mot can these bones הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh; these וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar ;And I answered אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai O Lord יְהוִ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You יָדָֽעְתָּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da-'e-ta. thou knowest

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Again he said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me הִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> hin-na-Ve unto me Prophesy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הָעֲצָמ֣וֹת <S%H6106><s%> ha-'a-tza-Mot upon these bones הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh; these וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, about הָעֲצָמוֹת֙ <S%H6106><s%> ha-'a-tza-mOt bones הַיְבֵשׁ֔וֹת <S%H3002><s%> hay-ve-Shot, unto them O ye dry שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD לָעֲצָמ֖וֹת <S%H6106><s%> la-'a-tza-Mot unto these bones הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh; to these הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אֲנִ֜י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I מֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> me-Vi to enter בָכֶ֛ם va-Chem ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach Behold I will cause breath וִחְיִיתֶֽם׃ <S%H2421><s%> vich-yi-Tem. into you and ye shall live

וְנָתַתִּי֩ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will lay עֲלֵיכֶ֨ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem and גִּדִ֜ים <S%H1517><s%> gi-Dim sinews וְֽהַעֲלֵתִ֧י <S%H5927><s%> ve-ha-'al-Ti upon you and will bring up עֲלֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem on בָּשָׂ֗ר <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar, flesh וְקָרַמְתִּ֤י <S%H7159><s%> ve-ka-ram-Ti upon you and cover עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem with ע֔וֹר <S%H5785><s%> or, you with skin וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti and put בָכֶ֛ם va-Chem ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach breath וִחְיִיתֶ֑ם <S%H2421><s%> vich-yi-Tem; in you and ye shall live וִידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD

וְנִבֵּ֖אתִי <S%H5012><s%> ve-nib-Be-ti So I prophesied כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher I צֻוֵּ֑יתִי <S%H6680><s%> tzuv-Vei-ti; as I was commanded וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- there was ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol there was a noise כְּהִנָּֽבְאִי֙ <S%H5012><s%> ke-hin-na-ve-'I and as I prophesied וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- and behold רַ֔עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> Ra-'ash, and behold a shaking וַתִּקְרְב֣וּ <S%H7126><s%> vat-tik-re-Vu came together עֲצָמ֔וֹת <S%H6106><s%> a-tza-Mot, and the bones עֶ֖צֶם <S%H6106><s%> 'E-tzem bone אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to עַצְמֽוֹ׃ <S%H6106><s%> atz-Mo. to his bone

וְרָאִ֜יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'I-ti And when I beheld וְהִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- and behold עֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem and גִּדִים֙ <S%H1517><s%> gi-Dim lo the sinews וּבָשָׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> u-va-Sar and the flesh עָלָ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah, came up וַיִּקְרַ֧ם <S%H7159><s%> vai-yik-Ram covered עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem and ע֖וֹר <S%H5785><s%> or upon them and the skin מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> mil-Ma-'e-lah; them above וְר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ve-Ru-ach but [there was] no breath אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein there בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me הִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> hin-na-Ve he unto me Prophesy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָר֑וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ha-Ru-ach; unto the wind הִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> hin-na-Ve prophesy בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- son אָ֠דָם <S%H120><s%> 'A-dom of man וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָר֜וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ha-Ru-ach to the wind כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh GOD מֵאַרְבַּ֤ע <S%H702><s%> me-'ar-Ba' from the four רוּחוֹת֙ <S%H7307><s%> ru-chOt winds בֹּ֣אִי <S%H935><s%> Bo-'i Come הָר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ha-Ru-ach, O breath וּפְחִ֛י <S%H5301><s%> u-fe-Chi and breathe בַּהֲרוּגִ֥ים <S%H2026><s%> ba-ha-ru-Gim upon these slain הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these וְיִֽחְיֽוּ׃ <S%H2421><s%> ve-Yich-Yu. that they may live

וְהִנַּבֵּ֖אתִי <S%H5012><s%> ve-hin-nab-Be-ti So I prophesied כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he צִוָּ֑נִי <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Va-ni; as he commanded וַתָּבוֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Vo came בָהֶ֨ם va-Hem הָר֜וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ha-Ru-ach me and the breath וַיִּֽחְי֗וּ <S%H2421><s%> vai-yich-Yu, into them and they lived וַיַּֽעַמְדוּ֙ <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'am-Du and stood up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7272><s%> rag-lei-Hem, upon their feet חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil army גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol great מְאֹד־ <S%H3966><s%> me-'od- an exceedingly מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. an exceedingly ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mer Then he said אֵלַי֒ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man הָעֲצָמ֣וֹת <S%H6106><s%> ha-'a-tza-Mot these bones הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- are the whole בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit are the whole house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah; like הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold אֹמְרִ֗ים <S%H559><s%> 'o-me-Rim, behold they say יָבְשׁ֧וּ <S%H3001><s%> ya-ve-Shu are dried עַצְמוֹתֵ֛ינוּ <S%H6106><s%> atz-mo-Tei-nu Our bones וְאָבְדָ֥ה <S%H6><s%> ve-'a-ve-Dah is lost תִקְוָתֵ֖נוּ <S%H8615><s%> tik-va-Te-nu and our hope נִגְזַ֥רְנוּ <S%H1504><s%> nig-Zar-nu we are cut off לָֽנוּ׃ <S%H99999><s%> La-nu.

לָכֵן֩ <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore הִנָּבֵ֨א <S%H5012><s%> hin-na-Ve Therefore prophesy וְאָמַרְתָּ֜ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I פֹתֵ֜חַ <S%H6605><s%> fo-Te-ach I will open אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קִבְרֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H6913><s%> kiv-ro-tei-Chem, your graves וְהַעֲלֵיתִ֥י <S%H5927><s%> ve-ha-'a-lei-Ti and cause you to come up אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מִקִּבְרוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6913><s%> mik-kiv-ro-tei-Chem out of your graves עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi; Behold O my people וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <S%H935><s%> ve-he-ve-Ti and bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into אַדְמַ֥ת <S%H127><s%> 'ad-Mat you into the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel ס sa-Mek

וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem And ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; that I [am] the LORD בְּפִתְחִ֣י <S%H6605><s%> be-fit-Chi when I have opened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קִבְרֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H6913><s%> kiv-ro-tei-Chem, your graves וּבְהַעֲלוֹתִ֥י <S%H5927><s%> u-ve-ha-'a-lo-Ti and brought you up אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מִקִּבְרוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6913><s%> mik-kiv-ro-tei-Chem out of your graves עַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi. O my people

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And shall put רוּחִ֤י <S%H7307><s%> ru-Chi my spirit בָכֶם֙ va-Chem וִחְיִיתֶ֔ם <S%H2421><s%> vich-yi-Tem, in you and ye shall live וְהִנַּחְתִּ֥י <S%H3240><s%> ve-hin-nach-Ti and I shall place אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and אַדְמַתְכֶ֑ם <S%H127><s%> 'ad-mat-Chem; you in your own land וִידַעְתֶּ֞ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem then shall ye know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֧י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that I the LORD דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti have spoken וְעָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ti [it] and performed נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- [it] saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD פ Peh

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came again unto me saying

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- Moreover thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> kach- take לְךָ֙ le-Cha עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz stick אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, thee one וּכְתֹ֤ב <S%H3789><s%> u-che-To and write עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav on לִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> li-hu-Dah, upon it For Judah וְלִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-Nei and for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel; חֲבֵרֹו cha-ve-rov כחֲבֵרָ֑יו <S%H2270><s%> cha-ve-Rav; companion קוּלְקַח֙ <S%H3947><s%> u-le-Kach then take עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz stick אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, another וּכְת֣וֹב <S%H3789><s%> u-che-Tov and write עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, on לְיוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> le-yo-Sef upon it For Joseph עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz the stick אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit and [for] all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel; חֲבֵרֹו cha-ve-rov כחֲבֵרָֽיו׃ <S%H2270><s%> cha-ve-Rav. companion ק
